Member.name: AllowedControls
Member.summary: Gets or sets the controls that aren't disabled when is true.

Member.name: Owner
Member.summary:
Gets the current owner.
Once this is closed, it loses its owner. Use to specify the owner.
Member.value: The owner or null if it doesn't have an owner or is hidden.

Member.name: ForEachItemOnScreen
Member.summary: Executes the specified action for each item that is currently on-screen. An item is considered on-screen if the current menu is visible, its property is true and is currently being drawn.
